item.title: 不降低利率的两个最简单理由
item.description: 大家好，欢迎阅读《奇点》时事通讯，它是来自《奇点》世界的每日内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 贝森特不期待美联储今天降息，呼吁 "发挥想象力
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，他预计美联储不会在周三降息，同时呼吁央行在未来的决策过程中更加开放。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said he’s not expecting the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates Wednesday, while calling on the central bank to be more open going forward in their approach toward policymaking.】

item.title: 通胀缓解，加纳降息幅度创历史之最
item.description: 加纳将关键利率的下调幅度创下历史之最，因为这个西非国家的通胀速度明显放缓，而且有望进一步放缓。【原文：Ghana lowered the key interest rate by the most on record after the pace of inflation significantly slowed in the West African nation and is expected to ease further.】

item.title: MTA 批准康涅狄格州铁路乘客票价上涨 10
item.description: 大都会运输管理局批准了康涅狄格州的请求，将穿越该州的部分 Metro-North 铁路的票价合并上调 10%。【原文：The Metropolitan Transportation Authority approved Connecticut’s request for a combined 10% fare hike on a portion of the Metro-North Railroad that runs through its state.】

item.title: 特朗普上台后，印度炼油商要求澄清俄罗斯石油问题
item.description: 印度的炼油厂是俄罗斯原油的重要需求来源，它们正在寻求新德里政府澄清其采购是否会受到唐纳德-特朗普最新社交媒体帖子的影响。【原文：India’s oil refiners, a vital source of demand for Russian crude, are seeking clarification from the government in New Delhi as to whether their purchases will be affected by Donald Trump’s latest social media post.】

item.title: 高风险借款人扎堆涌入 "垃圾 "市场
item.description: 在杠杆融资市场上，过多的资金追逐过少的交易，使得即使违约风险最高的公司也能增加杠杆或节省利息成本。【原文：Too much money is chasing too few deals in the leveraged finance market, allowing companies with even the highest default risk to pile on more leverage or save on their interest costs.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Carrhae 计划 7 亿美元避开中国的策略
item.description: 一些美国投资者改变了投资基准，将中国排除在其投资组合之外，在这种需求的推动下，Carrhae Capital 正准备建立一个长期资金池，剔除所有对中国的投资。【原文：Carrhae Capital is preparing to carve out a long-only money pool that eliminates all exposure to China, driven by demand from some US investors who have changed benchmarks to exclude the country from their portfolios.】

item.title: UPS 市值领先联邦快递的优势降至历史最窄
item.description: 联合包裹服务公司（United Parcel Service Inc.【原文：United Parcel Service Inc.’s once-towering lead over rival FedEx Corp. in market valuation has shrunk to the smallest ever after a 29% plunge in UPS shares this year.】

item.title: 匈牙利欧尔班通过住房补贴计划增加选举开支
item.description: 匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）将为公职人员提供额外的住房补贴，以扭转他在大选前不到一年的时间里民望下滑的局面。【原文：Hungary will offer public employees additional home subsidies as Prime Minister Viktor Orban seeks to reverse his popularity slide less than a year before elections.】

item.title: 西班牙电信希望与北约和欧盟盟国签订防务合同
item.description: 西班牙电信公司（Telefonica SA）执行主席表示，随着欧洲各国纷纷增加军费开支，该公司已经发现了在西班牙以外地区发展国防业务的机会。【原文：Telefonica SA has identified an opportunity to grow its defense business outside Spain as countries across Europe ramp up military spending, its executive chairman says.】

item.title: 南非规划局成为 SharePoint 黑客攻击的目标
item.description: 在最近对微软公司 SharePoint 客户的攻击中，黑客以南非规划、监测和评估部为目标。【原文：Hackers targeted South Africa’s Department of Planning, Monitoring and Evaluation in recent attacks on Microsoft Corp.’s SharePoint customers.】

item.title: BMI 称，如果黄金暴跌，加纳、坦桑尼亚和乌干达外汇储备面临的风险最大
item.description: 在非洲，加纳、坦桑尼亚和乌干达面临的风险最高，如果金价突然下跌，这些国家持有的外汇储备就会暴跌，从而有可能对其货币造成新的压力。【原文：Ghana, Tanzania and Uganda face the highest risk in Africa of a plunge in their foreign-exchange holdings if gold prices fall suddenly, potentially putting renewed pressure on their currencies.】

item.title: 染色& 达勒姆与活动家停战，开始审查
item.description: 法律软件提供商 Dye & Durham Ltd. 在与其最大的投资者之一达成停战协议后，开始对包括潜在出售在内的战略选择进行审查，以实现股东价值最大化。该公司股价在早盘交易中一度飙升 22%。【原文：Legal software provider Dye & Durham Ltd. launched a review of strategic options, including a potential sale, in a bid to maximize shareholder value after reaching a truce with one of its largest investors. The shares jumped as much as 22% in early trading.】

item.title: 标准普尔 500 指数在美联储和大型科技公司成绩单公布前徘徊在历史纪录附近
item.description: 随着一系列重要经济数据和财报的公布，以及今天下午迫在眉睫的利率决定和美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的评论，美国股市周三走高。【原文：US stocks edged higher Wednesday as a crucial stretch of economic data and earnings readouts got underway, alongside a looming interest-rate decision this afternoon and commentary from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 特朗普加征 25% 关税，印度股票期货和离岸卢比下跌
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示将对来自全球增长最快的主要经济体的进口商品征收 25% 的关税并处以额外罚款后，印度股票期货周三下滑，卢比离岸汇率下跌。【原文：Indian stock futures slid and the rupee dropped offshore on Wednesday after US President Donald Trump said he would impose a tariff rate of 25% along with an additional penalty on imports from the world’s fastest growing major economy.】

item.title: 加拿大央行将利率维持在 2.75%，为进一步减息敞开大门
item.description: 加拿大央行维持利率不变，理由是美国关税带来的不确定性，但如果经济疲软、通胀压力受控，央行仍有可能进一步下调利率。【原文：The Bank of Canada left interest rates unchanged, citing uncertainty posed by US tariffs, but kept the door open to more cuts if the economy weakens and inflation pressures stay in check.】

item.title: 据说石油天然气公司 Action Energy 着眼于在科威特进行罕见的首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，行动能源公司正计划在科威特进行首次公开募股，这可能是自 2008 年以来该海湾国家的首次能源上市。【原文：Action Energy Co. is planning an initial public offering in Kuwait, potentially setting up the first energy listing in the Gulf state since 2008, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 哈雷戴维森飙升，KKR 和 Pimco 将收购金融部门股份
item.description: 周三，哈雷戴维森公司（Harley-Davidson Inc.【原文：Shares of Harley-Davidson Inc. surged Wednesday after the motorcycle maker announced plans to monetize part of its finance unit through selling a nearly 10% stake and more than $5 billion of retail loans.】

item.title: 数据强劲，美元将创二月以来最长连胜纪录
item.description: 在最新数据凸显美国经济强劲之后，美元创下 2 月份以来最长单日涨幅。【原文：The dollar headed for its longest run of daily gains since February after the latest data underscored the strength of the US economy.】

item.title: 瑞士寻求莱茵金属和国防企业投资 2.5 亿美元建立芯片工厂
item.description: 据熟悉计划的人士透露，瑞士的顶级研究机构正在与包括莱茵金属公司在内的军火制造商进行早期谈判，以资助一家价值 2.5 亿美元的新半导体工厂。【原文：Switzerland’s top research institutions are in early talks with arms makers including Rheinmetall AG to fund a new $250 million semiconductor plant, according to people familiar with the plans, as the historically neutral country wades deeper into defense amid surging European military spending.】

item.title: 美国经济活动反弹，国债跌幅扩大
item.description: 最新数据显示，截至 6 月份的三个月中，美国经济增长增强，国债下跌。【原文：Treasuries fell after fresh data showed US economic growth strengthened in the three months ending in June.】

item.title: Jio Financial 获得董事会批准，向创始人融资 18 亿美元
item.description: 吉奥金融服务有限公司（Jio Financial Services Ltd.）计划通过向创始人出售股份筹集多达 1583 亿卢比（18 亿美元）的资金，越来越多的迹象表明，亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）正在加倍努力发展印度的影子银行业。【原文：Jio Financial Services Ltd. plans to raise as much as 158.3 billion rupees ($1.8 billion) from a share sale to its founders, in growing signs that billionaire Mukesh Ambani is doubling down on India’s shadow banking sector.】

item.title: 贸易逆转后美国经济反弹，GDP 增长 3
item.description: 美国经济活动在第二季度出现反弹，原因是消费支出小幅回升，以及在年初争抢外国商品之后进口明显下降。【原文：US economic activity rebounded in the second quarter on a modest pickup in consumer spending and a marked drop in imports after a scramble to secure foreign goods earlier in the year.】

item.title: Palo Alto Networks 以 250 亿美元收购 CyberArk
item.description: Palo Alto Networks 公司同意以现金加股票的方式收购 CyberArk 软件有限公司，对这家以色列网络安全公司的估值约为 250 亿美元。【原文：Palo Alto Networks Inc. agreed to buy CyberArk Software Ltd. in a cash-and-stock deal valuing the Israeli cybersecurity company at about $25 billion.】

item.title: ADP 数据显示美国企业新增 104,000 个就业岗位，高于预期
item.description: 美国公司在前一个月大幅回落之后，于 7 月份加大了招聘力度，但招聘速度仍与劳动力需求疲软相一致。【原文：US companies stepped up hiring in July after a sharp pullback in the previous month, though the pace remained consistent with weaker labor demand.】

item.title: 墨西哥经济增长超出预期，抵御关税风险
item.description: 截至 6 月份的三个月中，墨西哥的季度增长高于预期，尽管美国政府征收关税，但制造业和服务业仍为拉美第二大经济体提供了动力。【原文：Mexico’s quarterly growth came in higher than expected in the three months through June as manufacturing and services powered Latin America’s second-largest economy despite the US government’s tariffs.】

item.title: 南非为价值 220 亿美元的电网扩建计划寻找投标人
item.description: 南非正在为一个 3,900 亿兰特（约合 220 亿美元）的电网扩建项目寻找投标人入围名单，以加强该国的能源安全。【原文：South Africa is seeking proposals to shortlist bidders for a 390-billion-rand ($22 billion) grid expansion project to bolster the country’s energy security.】

item.title: 普拉达销售额逊于预期，奢侈品市场面临挑战
item.description: 普拉达公司（Prada SpA）今年上半年的销售额增幅低于预期，原因是在奢侈品市场普遍不景气的情况下，意大利时装集团的同名品牌需求放缓。【原文：Prada SpA’s sales rose less than expected in the first half of the year, as demand slowed for the Italian fashion group’s eponymous brand amid a broader slump in the luxury market.】

item.title: 据说欧盟将推动阿尔诺所倡导的烈酒-葡萄酒关税协议
item.description: 本周，欧盟与美国达成了 15%的关税协议，欧盟正努力争取更多的关税豁免，其中葡萄酒和烈酒是重中之重。【原文：The European Union is pushing to get more exemptions from the 15% tariff agreed with the US this week, with wines and spirits a top priority.】
